snippet: The city conducted a public survey to decide whether to replace its streetlights’ sodium light bulbs with L.E.D.’s, a move that could save money and energy.
abstract: Seattle conducts a public survey to decide whether to replace its streetlights’ sodium light bulbs with LED's, a move that could save the city money and energy.
lead_paragraph: The city conducted a public survey to decide whether to replace its streetlights’ sodium light bulbs with L.E.D.’s, a move that could save money and energy.

headline.seo: Seattle Gets the People’s View on L.E.D. Streetlights
headline.main: Seattle Gets the Street View on the Quality of Its Lights
headline.print_headline: Seattle Gets the Street View On the Quality of Its Lights
